duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead the design of individual projects including scope development, schedule, budget, plans, and both prescriptive and performance specifications.
Perform on-site requirements gathering and scope definition assessments as part of design phase initiation.
Create and lead capital program projects designs to support new initiatives, energy conservation, and state of good repair.

Lead the review of multi-discipline architectural and engineering designs prepared by outside agencies, for projects to be constructed on company property, to ensure compliance with industry standards.
Provide technical support to company's field staff as a Civil Subject Matter Expert.

Provide technical support during construction and respond to submittals, shop drawings, RFI's, and change order requests and/or coordinate with and manage the DOR on associated Construction Phase Services.
Self-perform design services on small design projects with limited oversight.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Engineering (Civil Engineering) and Masters (Preferred)
